summary: One year after the suicide of C-list model Kisaragi Miki, five of her fans come together for a commemorative meeting; fan club leader Iemoto, Oda Yuji, "Snake", Yasuo, and "Strawberry Girl"... See full summary »
cast: Shun Oguri|Yûsuke Santamaria|Keisuke Koide|Muga Tsukaji|Teruyuki Kagawa|Kanako Sakai|Jô Shishido
title: Kisaragi
